HOME.DESCRIPTION: Lumora offers comfortable and hospitable environments. A 4-star stay that will leave a mark in your memory in the city of the Saint.
HOME.COMFORT: Comfort, design, hospitality represent a guarantee for your stay in the center of Padua.
HOME.SERVICES: Your choice can fall on a wide range of services at your disposal.
HOME.EVENTS: The structure also offers the possibility of organizing events and business meetings.

CONFIRM_DELETE.TEXT: This action will permanently delete your account.

CONFIRM_DELETE.TEXT: This action will permanently delete the selected reservation.
CONFIRM_DELETE.RESULT_HTML: Your selected reservation has been deleted

RESTAURANT.DESCRIPTION: From mountain cured meats to fresh first courses, passing through Fiorentina and excellent wines. Each dish tells a story of authentic flavors.

MEETING.TITLE: Your Ideal Space for Every Business Occasion
MEETING.DESCRIPTION: Our meeting rooms are equipped with cutting-edge technology and designed for comfort and productivity. Whether you're hosting a conference, training session, or business negotiation, we offer a professional and elegant setting to suit all your needs.

ROOMS.INTRO_TEXT: At Lumora, we don't just offer rooms — we craft experiences.
ROOMS.COMFORT: COMFORT through refined and thoughtful services,
ROOMS.WELL_BEING: WELL-BEING to make you feel truly at home,
ROOMS.CUSTOMER_SATISFACTION: CUSTOMER SATISFACTION at the heart of everything we do.
ROOMS.CTA: Your stay with us isn't just a visit — it's a memory in the making. Discover the difference. Try Lumora, and you won't regret it.
ROOMS.OUR_SERVICES_INTRO: At Lumora, every detail is designed to enhance your stay. Discover the exclusive services and amenities available in our rooms:
ROOMS.ITEM_LIST_3: Kettle with tea and coffee on request
ROOMS.ITEM_LIST_7: Accessible rooms for guests with disabilities
ROOMS.ITEM_LIST_11: USB ports by the bedside tables
ROOMS.ITEM_LIST_14: Iron and ironing board on request
ROOMS.ITEM_LIST_17: Complimentary in-room tea and coffee service
ROOMS.ITEM_LIST_19: Satellite TV with free Sky channels

SINGLE.TITLE: Single Room
SINGLE.DESCRIPTION: Perfect for solo travelers, the Single Room offers a cozy, quiet environment with all the essentials for a comfortable stay.
AMENITIES: Free tea and coffee service directly in the room
Kettle with tea and coffee on request
Iron and ironing board on request

DOUBLE.TITLE: Double Room
DOUBLE.DESCRIPTION: Ideal for couples or friends, the Double Room combines space, comfort, and modern style for a relaxing experience.

TRIPLE.TITLE: Triple Room
TRIPLE.DESCRIPTION: Spacious and functional, the Triple Room is perfect for small groups or families, offering flexibility and comfort.
AMENITIES: One double bed and one single bed

FAMILY.TITLE: Family Room
FAMILY.DESCRIPTION: Designed for families, this room offers generous space, child-friendly features, and everything needed for a pleasant stay together.
AMENITIES: Two double beds or one double + bunk beds

SUITE.TITLE: Suite
SUITE.DESCRIPTION: Elegant and luxurious, our Suite is ideal for special occasions or longer stays, offering a separate living area and top-tier comfort.

PET.TITLE: Pet Friendly Room
PET.DESCRIPTION: Traveling with a furry friend? Our Pet Friendly Room ensures both you and your pet enjoy a welcoming, cozy stay.
AMENITIES: A bowl for water and one for food
A kennel for each dog and a bed for each cat
A litter box with sand in the room
A contact for a local veterinarian available 24 hours a day

ROOM_DETAIL.CONFIRM_BOOKING_TITLE: Are you sure you want to book this room?
